MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY16 postcode area of Newtown, affecting customers on Garth Owen. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:43PM. Our engineers have established that there is an underground cable fault and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 9:00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:51PM on 7th March 2021
